activities.name: lk_jobs
activities.description: Read the dbo.adf_control_ingest table for jobs to run.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT group_label
	,source_database
	,source_schema
	,source_table
	,source_key_columnlist
	,source_extract_sql
	,data_lake_container
	,data_lake_folder
FROM dbo.adf_control_ingest
WHERE is_active_flag = 'Y'
